actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend part A of title XVIII of the Social Security Act to cover certain additional inpatient hospital services furnished outside the United States to individuals insured for benefits provided under such part A.

summary.text: Authorizes coverage of emergency inpatient hospital services furnished outisde the United States to individuals insured for hospital benefits under the Medicare program of the Social Security Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend part A of title XVIII of the Social Security Act to cover certain additional inpatient hospital services furnished outside the United States to individuals insured for benefits provided under such part A.
